scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma... We might not be in this world
much longer, don’t you think?
How should I respond to Aoi?
It won’t take long.
It may take some time.

It won’t take much longer.
If all goes well, anyway.
I see...
What’s up? You don’t look too happy...
He’s right, Aoi. You okay?
Yes. I want to go back to my world, but...

The idea that I only have a little more time
with everyone here makes me a bit sad...

I can understand. You’re like a mother to
the critters here.

Yeah, she cooks all the meals, gives us
advice. She works her tail off for us!

As soon as anything goes wrong, Minoru’s
running around looking for her.

Ha ha, it’s not like I mind it. Being relied
on actually puts my mind at ease.

It may time some time... There’s still plenty
for us to take care of here.
Yeah, you’re right...
Something wrong, Aoi?
Yes. I want to go back to my world, but...

The idea that I only have a little more time
with everyone here makes me a bit sad...

Still, it’s not like our time is up.
There’s still plenty to be done here.
Well now, time to get back to it!

That Aoi... She really loves looking after
all of us!
Yeah, let’s leave her to it a bit longer.

You know, now that I think about it...
We’ve changed so much since then.
Then?

You know, before we came to this world.
Remember how we were at camp?
Ahhh, yeah I see what you mean...

(I honestly haven’t thought about the camp
for such a long time now...)

Hey, Takuma! What was Aoi like before she
came to this world?
Before, Aoi was...
More subdued.
Much harsher.
She was more subdued.
What?! Could you please elaborate, Takuma?

Uh... I didn’t mean anything by it.
I just think you’re a lot tougher now.

Really, now! I guess Aoi used to be more of
a pushover, huh?

A pushover, you say...
Have I really changed that much?

No, how can I put this... It’s like you’re...
stronger, internally? More reliable.

I...think I get it. So you’re giving me
a compliment?
Sounds he’s praising you to me!
I mean, I’m trying to...
Thank you, Takuma.
She was way harsher.

Harsher?! Did I really give such a bad
impression back then?!

Uh, maybe “harsh” was a bit...harsh.
It’s just that, you always scolded Minoru.

Well that’s... Minoru just wouldn’t let up
back then! Sheesh...

Heh, it sounds like you’ve changed for the
better since you came to this world, Aoi.

I’m not the only one that’s changed since
that camp. You have too, Takuma.
How should I respond to Aoi?
I’ve changed...?
I’ve changed a ton.

I’ve changed...? If you say so...
I honestly don’t see it.

I feel the same about myself. I suppose it’s
not something you can gauge on your own.

I think you’ve gotten much stronger, Takuma.
And I bet everyone else feels the same.
I’ve changed a ton... Even I can tell.

You’ve certainly grown more confident.
I wonder if it’s the way you lead everyone.

Who knows? So much has happened...
Lots of sad things, but happy things, too.

No matter what, I just didn’t want to lose.
And on top of that...
I was lucky enough to have a great partner.

Ah, you mean Agumon. I completely agree!
I’ve got an amazing partner of my own, too!

Heh heh, my ears are burning...
Thanks, Aoi!
